dieceng_boss_hum_057_nubukejie_-1_10.description: An unfathomable rage is brewing, each attack gains **1** stack of rage, gaining up to **1** stack per second. Upon reaching **20** stacks, become infuriated, shocking nearby teammates shortly after.

eventdes_boss044sp_common3.name: Absolute Defense
eventdes_boss044sp_common3.description: When Harrah's HP drops to a certain percentage, she enters a defensive mode, launching no attacks and gaining invincibility. During her invincibility period, energy cores appear in the air and slowly descend, which grants them a buff upon contact with Wanderers before landing on the ground, significantly enhancing their jump height and speed and reducing their END consumption. The energy cores also interfere with Harrah's defensive mode. If the energy cores are seized multiple times, Harrah's invincibility state ends prematurely.

eventdes_boss044sp_fire1.name: Scorch
eventdes_boss044sp_fire1.description: Harrah inflicts Ember marks on the surrounding Wanderers, and the closer they are to Harrah, the faster the marks stack up, up to 100 stacks. Wanderers with more than 50 Ember mark stacks, when damaged by Harrah, will have all their Ember marks cleared and receive additional damage based on the stacks of Ember marks.

eventdes_boss044sp_fire2.name: Hatch
eventdes_boss044sp_fire2.description: During combat, Harrah periodically hatches small Grayspace Entities and expels them. Destroy the entities in time to remove all Ember marks from surrounding Wanderers and grant them a 10s immunity to Ember marks.

eventdes_boss044sp_ice1.name: Icebound
eventdes_boss044sp_ice1.description: Harrah inflicts Frosty marks on the surrounding Wanderers, up to 25 stacks. When Frosty marks reach full stacks, the target Wanderer will be frozen. If damaged by Harrah during the freeze, the freeze status is lifted, but the target suffers significant Icebreak damage 1 time.

eventdes_boss044sp_ice2.name: Hatch
eventdes_boss044sp_ice2.description: During combat, Harrah periodically hatches small Grayspace Entities and expels them. Destroy the entities in time to remove all Frosty marks from surrounding Wanderers and grant them a 10s immunity to Frosty marks.

eventdes_boss044sp_phy1.name: Disdain
eventdes_boss044sp_phy1.description: Wanderers near Harrah or taking damage from her will be inflicted with Oppression marks, up to 50 stacks. Each Oppression mark reduces the Wanderer's Max HP by 1%, up to a maximum reduction of 50%.

eventdes_boss044sp_phy2.name: Hatch
eventdes_boss044sp_phy2.description: During combat, Harrah periodically hatches small Grayspace Entities and expels them. Destroy the entities in time to remove all Oppression marks from surrounding Wanderers and grant them a 10s immunity to Oppression marks.

eventdes_boss044sp_super1.name: Withering
eventdes_boss044sp_super1.description: Every time a Wanderer takes damage from Harrah, they're also inflicted with the Temporal Distortion marks, up to 10 stacks. When these marks reach full stacks, the character is subjected to the Withering Effect, losing END periodically throughout the duration.

eventdes_boss044sp_super2.name: Hatch
eventdes_boss044sp_super2.description: During combat, Harrah periodically hatches small Grayspace Entities and expels them. Destroy the entities in time to remove all Withering Effect from surrounding Wanderers and grant them a 10s immunity to Temporal Distortion marks.

eventdes_boss044sp_thu1.name: Tempest Round
eventdes_boss044sp_thu1.description: During combat, Harrah periodically summons lightning strikes. When a target struck by lightning's Electrify stacks is fewer than 10, they will receive volt damage based on the number of Electrify stacks, then receive 1 Electrify mark. After reaching 10 Electrify stacks, the target struck by lightning is pierced by high voltage, receiving lethal damage equal to 120% of Max HP.

buff_wy_quanshui.name: Sanctuary

ge_damage_frostdamage.name: Frostbite

buff_dartsphy_ssr_level5_skilldamageup.name: 5-Star Full Moon Advancement
buff_dartsphy_ssr_level5_skilldamageup.description: Increase damage of **Full Bloom** by **10%**. The effect can be stacked up to **3** times and lasts for **15** seconds.

buff_de_distancestun_formonster.name: Confine

buff_de_evaderecover_lv3.name: Break Time
buff_de_evaderecover_lv3.description: Recover 0.3% of Max HP whenever the target uses a dodge skill.

buff_de_halo_damage_lv1.name: Radiation

buff_de_recover_lv2.name: Heal

buff_de_remove_buff.name: Cleaning Up
buff_de_remove_buff.description: Clear all buffs and charges from enemy Wanderers as well as summons in the area.

buff_de_tata_8s.name: Tata Transformation
buff_de_tata_8s.description: Transform the enemy Wanderer into Tata for 8 seconds.

buff_spear_thu_ssr.name: Electrify
buff_spear_thu_ssr.description: Your suppressor is broken! Unable to use any weapon for now!

ge_artifactsr007_confusion_level7.name: Chaos
ge_artifactsr007_confusion_level7.description: Become disoriented. Movement direction inputs will be swapped for **3** seconds.

ge_artifactssr020_bigbubble_cooldown.name: Core Cooldown
ge_artifactssr020_bigbubble_cooldown.description: The Bubble Gun's core is overheated. Unable to fire big bubbles at this moment.

ge_artifactssr020_superbubble_cooldown.name: Operation Overload
ge_artifactssr020_superbubble_cooldown.description: The bubble machine is overloaded. Unable to fire super big bubbles at this moment.

buff_breakvalue_pvpstun.name: Shattered
buff_breakvalue_pvpstun.description: Your shield is broken. Stunned for 5 seconds.

buff_brush_bullet.name: Sparrow Feather
buff_brush_bullet.description:
When the wielder has a **Sparrow Feather**, using **Pine Comet** will launch a **Sparrow Feather** toward the locked-on target, dealing damage. The **Sparrow Feather** attack has a **1**-second cooldown.
When **Pine Comet** is in the off-hand slot, attacking with other weapons can also trigger **Sparrow Feather**, with a **2**-second cooldown for the **Sparrow Feather** attack.
The initial number of **Sparrow Feathers** is **30**, with a maximum capacity of **60**.

buff_brushfire_ssr_level0_firechangeskil.name: Sparroburn
buff_brushfire_ssr_level0_firechangeskil.description: Using any flame weapon's discharge skill will apply 1 stack of Sparroburn to the locked-on target, stacking up to 2 times on the same target.

buff_brushfire_ssr_level0_firespecial.name: Fiery Explosion: On-Field
buff_brushfire_ssr_level0_firespecial.description: **Fiery Explosion: On-Field**: When landing a hit with **Pine Comet**, every **1.5** seconds, it deals Fiery Explosion damage (Fiery Explosion damage equals to **0%** of flame ATK plus **1%** of Max HP plus **2%** of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus **3%** of crit). Fiery Explosion damage is not affected by damage boosts, except for titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects. The damage is counted as **normal attack** damage. If there is a volt/frost/physical weapon equipped in the **2** other weapon slots, Fiery Explosion damage is multiplied by **4** times.

buff_brushfire_ssr_level0_start.name: Flame Resonance
buff_brushfire_ssr_level0_start.description: **Flame Resonance**: Increase flame ATK by **20%** and flame resistance by **40%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Flame Resonance or Flame Reaction effects, with Flame Resonance taking precedence.

buff_brushfire_ssr_level3_recoverhp_star.name: Pine Comet: 5-Star Recovery
buff_brushfire_ssr_level3_recoverhp_star.description: When the Wanderer's HP is below **50%** of Max HP, every **0.5** seconds, consume **1** **Sparrow Feather** and recover **0%** of Max HP (increases to **1%** of Max HP in solo play) until the Wanderer's HP is full or all **Sparrow Feathers** are consumed. This effect works in the off-hand slot.

buff_brushfire_ssr_level5_miansi_cd.name: Pine Comet: 5-Star Recovery Escape Death Cooldown

buff_brushfire_ssr_melee_randomword.name: Small Seal
buff_brushfire_ssr_melee_randomword.description:
When dealing damage to the locked-on target using normal attacks, there is a **50%** chance to gather Small Seal.
**Flame**: Gather flame power to deal damage to the target. Can be triggered 1 time every **12** seconds.
**Burst**: Ignite flames to deal damage to nearby targets. Can be triggered 1 time every **7** seconds.
**Attract**: Draw in nearby targets with intense flames. Can be triggered 1 time every **15** seconds.

buff_tank.name: Weapon Resonance: Fortitude
buff_tank.description: Reduce damage by **25%**, increase shatter by **60%**, increase aggro by **800%**, and apply an elemental weak point corresponding to your current weapon's element to the target for 25 seconds. When in team play, reduce damage by an extra **20%**. (Equip 2 or more weapons of the same category to activate the corresponding weapon resonance effect.)

buff_soldier.name: Fierce Attack
buff_soldier.description: Increase final damage by **10%**. When in team play, additionally increase final damage by **40%**. (equip 2 or more weapons of the same category to activate the corresponding weapon resonance effect)

buff_assistant.name: Weapon Resonance: Benediction
buff_assistant.description: Increase healing by **100%**. When in team play, additionally increase healing by **100%** (equip 2 or more weapons of the same category to activate the corresponding weapon resonance effect).

buff_asuka_atfield_dmgup.name: A.T. Field Boost
buff_asuka_atfield_dmgup.description: When an A.T. Field is active, increase physical and flame damage.

buff_asuka_fire_resonance.name: Flame Resonance
buff_asuka_fire_resonance.description: **Flame Resonance**: Increase flame ATK by **15%** and flame resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Flame Resonance or Flame Reaction effects, with Flame Resonance taking precedence.

buff_asuka_level2.name: Perfection
buff_asuka_level2.description: Increase final damage by **0%**. When **Fortitude Resonance** is activated, the **A.T. Field** durability is set to at least **1%** of its maximum value.

buff_asuka_physic_resonance.name: Physical Resonance
buff_asuka_physic_resonance.description: **Physical Resonance**: Increase physical ATK by **15%** and physical resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more physical weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Physical Resonance or Physical Reaction effects, with Physical Resonance taking precedence.

buff_asukamiansi_breakfate.name: Ultimate Defense Shield

buff_attackignoretargetdef.name: Sharpened
buff_attackignoretargetdef.description: Ignore **0%** of target's physical resistance and **1%** of target's flame resistance. (Each element's total resistance ignored cannot exceed 50%)

buff_attackup_level1.name: Residual Heat
buff_attackup_level1.description: Increase all attack by **0%** for **1** seconds.

buff_attackup_level4.name: Residual Heat

buff_autochess_addatk_1.name: Edged I
buff_autochess_addatk_1.description: Triggered with **3** physical weapons: For every **1** enemy defeated, increase physical attack by **40%**, stacking up to **3** times. Last for **100** seconds.

buff_autochess_addatk_2.name: Edged II
buff_autochess_addatk_2.description: Triggered with **6** physical weapons: For every **1** enemy defeated, increase physical attack by **65%**, stacking up to **3** times. Last for **100** seconds.

buff_autochess_addatk_3.name: Edged III
buff_autochess_addatk_3.description: Triggered with **9** physical weapons: For every **1** enemy defeated, increase physical attack by **90%**, stacking up to **3** times. Last for **100** seconds.

buff_autochess_addenergy_1.name: Temporal I
buff_autochess_addenergy_1.description: Triggered with **3** frost weapons: Gain **80** weapon charge every second.

buff_autochess_addenergy_2.name: Temporal II
buff_autochess_addenergy_2.description: Triggered with **6** frost weapons: Gain **160** weapon charge every second.

buff_autochess_addenergy_3.name: Temporal III
buff_autochess_addenergy_3.description: Triggered with **9** frost weapons: Gain **240** weapon charge every second.

buff_autochess_addfireatk_1.name: Scorched Heart I
buff_autochess_addfireatk_1.description: Triggered with **3** flame weapons: For every **1%** of HP lost, increase flame damage by **0.7%** and lifesteal by **0.026%**. Meanwhile, using skills grants a burning status, deducting **4%** of current HP every second for **20** seconds. Regaining the burning status will refresh the duration of this effect.

buff_autochess_addfireatk_2.name: Scorched Heart II
buff_autochess_addfireatk_2.description: Triggered with **6** flame weapons: For every **1%** of HP lost, increase flame damage by **1.3%** and lifesteal by **0.04%**. Meanwhile, using skills grants a burning status, deducting **4%** of current HP every second for **20** seconds. Regaining the burning status will refresh the duration of this effect.

buff_autochess_addfireatk_3.name: Scorched Heart III
buff_autochess_addfireatk_3.description: Triggered with **9** flame weapons: For every **1%** of HP lost, increase flame damage by **1.9%** and lifesteal by **0.054%**. Meanwhile, using skills grants a burning status, deducting **4%** of current HP every second for **20** seconds. Regaining the burning status will refresh the duration of this effect.

buff_autochess_breakanddamageup_1.name: Harmonious Resonance I
buff_autochess_breakanddamageup_1.description: Triggered with every **1** of the three resonance weapon types: Increase shatter by **6%** and damage dealt by **60%**.

buff_autochess_breakanddamageup_2.name: Harmonious Resonance II
buff_autochess_breakanddamageup_2.description: Triggered with every **2** of the three resonance weapon types: Increase shatter by **12%** and damage dealt by **100%**.

buff_autochess_breakanddamageup_3.name: Harmonious Resonance III
buff_autochess_breakanddamageup_3.description: Triggered with every **3** of the three resonance weapon types: Increase shatter by **20%** and damage dealt by **140%**.

buff_autochess_breakup_1.name: Wall Breaker I
buff_autochess_breakup_1.description: Triggered with **3** Fortitude Resonance weapons: Increase shatter by **30%**. When an enemy's shield is broken, the next attack deals additional damage equal to **300,000%** of the broken shield's value.

buff_autochess_breakup_2.name: Wall Breaker II
buff_autochess_breakup_2.description: Triggered with **6** Fortitude Resonance weapons: Increase shatter by **60%**. When an enemy's shield is broken, the next attack deals additional damage equal to **600,000%** of the broken shield's value.

buff_autochess_breakup_3.name: Wall Breaker III
buff_autochess_breakup_3.description: Triggered with **9** Fortitude Resonance weapons: Increase shatter by **90%**. When an enemy's shield is broken, the next attack deals additional damage equal to **1,200,000%** of the broken shield's value.

buff_autochess_exdamage_1.name: Assault I
buff_autochess_exdamage_1.description: Triggered with **3** Attack Resonance weapons: When dealing damage each time, deal an additional **20%** damage unaffected by damage boost or reduction.

buff_autochess_exdamage_2.name: Assault II
buff_autochess_exdamage_2.description: Triggered with **6** Attack Resonance weapons: When dealing damage each time, deal an additional **40%** damage unaffected by damage boost or reduction.

buff_autochess_exdamage_3.name: Assault III
buff_autochess_exdamage_3.description: Triggered with **9** Attack Resonance weapons: When dealing damage each time, deal an additional **60%** damage unaffected by damage boost or reduction.

buff_autochess_refreshcd_1.name: Perception I
buff_autochess_refreshcd_1.description: Triggered with **1** Altered Resonance weapon: Every time after **3** enemies are defeated, reset the cooldown of all weapon skills and Relics.

buff_autochess_refreshcd_2.name: Perception II
buff_autochess_refreshcd_2.description: Triggered with **2** Altered Resonance weapons: Every time after **2** enemies are defeated, reset the cooldown of all weapon skills and Relics.

buff_autochess_refreshcd_3.name: Perception III
buff_autochess_refreshcd_3.description: Triggered with **3** Altered Resonance weapons: Every time after **1** enemy is defeated, reset the cooldown of all weapon skills and Relics.

buff_autochess_thunderlink_1.name: Electric Dance I
buff_autochess_thunderlink_1.description: Triggered with **3** volt weapons: After using a skill, gain an Electrified buff for **10** seconds. While being Electrified, the Wanderer's normal attack can trigger chain lightning every **1** second, dealing volt damage equal to **400%** of ATK, unaffected by damage boosts or reductions. The chain lightning will bounce between enemies up to **5** times. Regaining Electrified will refresh the duration of this effect.

buff_autochess_thunderlink_2.name: Electric Dance II
buff_autochess_thunderlink_2.description: Triggered with **6** volt weapons: After using a skill, gain an Electrified buff for **10** seconds. While being Electrified, the Wanderer's normal attack can trigger chain lightning every **1** second, dealing volt damage equal to **600%** of ATK, unaffected by damage boosts or reductions. The chain lightning will bounce between enemies up to **5** times. Regaining Electrified will refresh the duration of this effect.

buff_autochess_thunderlink_3.name: Electric Dance III
buff_autochess_thunderlink_3.description: Triggered with **9** volt weapons: After using a skill, gain an Electrified buff for **10** seconds. While being Electrified, the Wanderer's normal attack can trigger chain lightning every **1** second, dealing volt damage equal to **800%** of ATK, unaffected by damage boosts or reductions. The chain lightning will bounce between enemies up to **5** times. Regaining Electrified will refresh the duration of this effect.

buff_ayanamirei_ice_ssr_resonance.name: Frost Resonance
buff_ayanamirei_ice_ssr_resonance.description: **Frost Resonance**: Increase frost ATK by **15%** and frost resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more frost weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Frost Resonance or Frost Reaction effects, with Frost Resonance taking precedence.

buff_ayanamirei_level2.name: Guard
buff_ayanamirei_level2.description: Increase final damage by **18%**. When **Attack Resonance** is activated, increase volt damage by **8%**. When **any Resonance type other than Attack Resonance** is activated, increase **Charged Shots'** block effect to **0%** of the Wanderer's Max HP, and increase **Rapid Bow's** and **Aerial Assault's** **slowing magnetic field** duration to **4** seconds.

buff_ayanamirei_thunder_resonance.name: Volt Resonance
buff_ayanamirei_thunder_resonance.description: **Volt Resonance**: Increase volt ATK by **15%** and volt resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more volt weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Volt Resonance or Volt Reaction effects, with Volt Resonance taking precedence.

buff_ayanamireibedamagedown.name: Blocking Barrier
buff_ayanamireibedamagedown.description: Block damage that does not exceed **10%** of the Wanderer's Max HP for **15** seconds. The Wanderer can only have up to 3 Blocking Barriers simultaneously.

buff_ayanamireibedamagedown_imitationfea.name: Blocking Barrier

buff_cocoritter_level2.name: Cocoritter: Trust

buff_hane_level1.name: Tsubasa: Rainstorm

buff_hane_level2.name: Tsubasa: Raging Waves
buff_hane_level2.description: Each time Tsubasa deals damage, gain **1** stack of Fierce Strike, up to **1** stack per **1** second. Each stack adds **0.6%** ATK, up to **30** stacks. Refreshes effect duration upon gaining the effect again. The effect lasts for **30** seconds.

buff_hilda_level1.name: Hilda: Pedal to the Metal
buff_hilda_level1.description: When Hilda uses a vehicle, increase speed by **7%**.

buff_hilda_level2.name: Hilda: Full-speed Drifting

buff_huma_level1.name: Huma: Fortitude
buff_huma_level1.description: Each time Huma receives damage, gain **1** Fortitude mark and gain **1** more Fortitude mark if it is flame damage, up to **1** time per **1** second and **12** stacks in total. Upon using a weapon skill, use all Fortitude marks and gain an HP shield equal to the number of marks **0.4%** HP for **12** seconds. If Fortitude marks are used when the effect is stacked up to the maximum, then gain an HP shield equal to the number of marks **0.6%** HP.

buff_huma_level2.name: Huma: Iron Screen
buff_huma_level2.description: Each time Huma receives damage, gain **1** Fortitude mark and gain **1** more Fortitude mark if it is flame damage, up to **1** time per **1** second and **12** stacks in total. Upon using a weapon skill, use all Fortitude marks and gain an HP shield equal to the number of marks **0.6%** HP for **12** seconds. If Fortitude marks are used when the effect is stacked up to the maximum, then gain an HP shield equal to the number of marks **0.9%** HP.

buff_karasuma_level1.name: Crow: Loner
buff_karasuma_level1.description: When Crow is not in a team, increase damage dealt by **6%** and reduce damage received by **4%**.

buff_karasuma_level2.name: Crow: Silent Night
buff_karasuma_level2.description: When Crow is not in a team, increase damage dealt by **10%** and reduce damage received by **6%**. When Crow enters combat, increase damage dealt by **12%** for **12** seconds.

buff_kg_erosive.name: Corrosion
buff_kg_erosive.description: When damaged by a physical attack, damage received will not be dealt immediately, but will be converted into a Corrosion effect: Damage is continuously and slowly dealt over a certain period of time. The duration of this effect can be delayed or paused, but the total amount of damage to be dealt cannot be lessened, and the effect cannot end early unless the target is defeated.

buff_killknife_flame_ssr_level0_resonanc.name: Flame Resonance
buff_killknife_flame_ssr_level0_resonanc.description: **Flame Resonance**: Increase flame ATK by **15%** and flame resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more flame weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Flame Resonance or Flame Reaction effects, with Flame Resonance taking precedence.

buff_killknife_level1.name: Regulations
buff_killknife_level1.description: Increase final damage by **0%**. For every 1 physical weapon equipped, increase normal attack damage of **Equilibrium** by **1%**, up to **2%**.

buff_killknife_level2.name: Order
buff_killknife_level2.description: Increase final damage by **0%**. When **Equilibrium** is equipped, increase physical damage dealt to targets with less than **2%** of HP by **3%**. For every 1 physical weapon equipped, increase normal attack damage of **Equilibrium** by **1%**, up to **4%**.

buff_killknife_physic_ssr_level0_resonan.name: Physical Resonance
buff_killknife_physic_ssr_level0_resonan.description: **Physical Resonance**: Increase physical ATK by **15%** and physical resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more physical weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Physical Resonance or Physical Reaction effects, with Physical Resonance taking precedence.

buff_killknifephy_ssr_level0_physpecial.name: Flying Blades
buff_killknifephy_ssr_level0_physpecial.description: **Flying Blades: On-Field**: When landing any hit with **Equilibrium**, it deals damage to nearby targets equal to **0%** of physical ATK plus **1%** of the Wanderer's Max HP plus **2%** of the sum of all the Wanderer's resistance types plus **3%** of crit. This effect can be triggered up to 1 time every **1.5** seconds. The Flying Blades damage counts as normal attack damage. If there is **1** frost/volt weapon of any kind equipped, Flying Blades damage is multiplied by **4**. In addition, Flying Blades damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

buff_king_level1.name: KING: Coldblooded Swipe
buff_king_level1.description: Every **7** enemies defeated by KING restore HP equal to **8%** of Max HP.

buff_king_level2.name: KING: Fear Reaper
buff_king_level2.description: Every **5** enemies defeated by KING restore HP equal to **10%** of Max HP.

buff_manaka_level1.name: Echo: Uprightness

buff_manaka_level2.name: Echo: Determination

buff_meryl_level1.name: Meryl: Cool Rose
buff_meryl_level1.description: Reduce frost damage received by Meryl by **20%**, gain immunity to the frostbitten effect, and reduce duration of being frozen by **50%**.

buff_meryl_level2.name: Meryl: Frosted
buff_meryl_level2.description: Reduce frost damage received by Meryl by **25%**, gain immunity to the frostbite effect, and reduce the duration of being frozen by **50%**. The air around Meryl becomes cold, freezing the water around her.

buff_samir_level1.name: Samir: Trickery

buff_samir_level2.name: Samir: Shadow

buff_lancesice_ssr_level0_icespecial.name: Chilling Strike: On-Field

This effect can be triggered up to 1 time every **1.5** seconds. Chilling Strike damage counts as normal attack damage. If there is **1** physical/flame weapon of any kind equipped, Chilling Strike damage is multiplied by **4**. In addition, Chilling Strike damage is not affected by any damage boost effects except from titan equipment's rare stats, and won't trigger additional attack effects.

While shielding, there is an **11%** damage reduction and lasts for **15** seconds. This effect does not stack. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

buff_matrix_ssr23_level4.description: Upon attacking an enemy, grant a shield to all teammates equal to **15%** of the user's current HP. While shielding, there is a **17%** damage reduction and lasts for **15** seconds. This effect cannot be stacked. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

buff_matrix_ssr23_shield_level1.name: Shield
buff_matrix_ssr23_shield_level1.description: Grant a shield from an allied unit equal to 12% of their HP for 15 seconds. Upon activation, this shield's value will combine with any other active HP shields.

buff_matrix_ssr23_shield_level2.name: Shield

This set effect works in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

ge_paradoxsecond_bullettime_level3.name: My True Self Count

ge_queen_changeskill3_lockhp.name: Moonshield

ge_queen_gongsheng.name: Division
ge_queen_gongsheng.description:
Moonstar Bracelet's Division effect:
While Fortitude Resonance is active, gain **50%** of the other Wanderer's all resistance, and increase healing received from Moonstar Bracelet by **50%**.
When Balance Resonance/Attack Resonance is active, gain **20%** of the other Wanderer's ATK (up to **20,000**), and healing received from Moonstar Bracelet is increased by **50%**.
When Benediction Resonance is active, the outgoing healing effect of both Wanderers is increased by **30%**, and healing received from Moonstar Bracelet is increased by **50%**.

ge_queen_gongshengex.name: Division
ge_queen_gongshengex.description:
Link with an ally to activate the division effect (link ends when its range is exceeded or one of the pair is defeated). When the link is in effect, the pair cannot make a link or be linked again.
When the linked ally activates Fortitude Resonance, an extra **50%** of resistance is transmitted to the linked ally, and the linked ally's healing received from Moonstar Bracelet is increased by **50%**.
When the linked ally activates Balance Resonance/Attack Resonance, an extra **20%** of ATK is transmitted to the linked ally (no more than **20,000**), and the linked ally's healing received from Moonstar Bracelet is increased by **50%**.
When the linked ally activates Benediction Resonance, the outgoing healing of the pair is increased by **30%**, and their healing received from Moonstar Bracelet is increased by **50%**.

buff_shieldfire_ssr_level5_start.name: 5-Star Molten Shield V2: Effect
buff_shieldfire_ssr_level5_start.description: After switching to a shield axe, immediately grant **30%** damage reduction that diminishes by **10%** every **3** seconds, down to a minimum of **10%**. Switching weapons cancels this effect. Cooldown: **30** seconds.

buff_sally_level1.name: Nemesis: Metamorphosis
buff_sally_level1.description: After summoning an Electrode, deal volt damage equal to **60%** of ATK to all enemies within **30** meters of the Electrode and heal all allies (including the user) within its range by **120%** of ATK.

buff_sally_level2.name: Nemesis: Sublimation
buff_sally_level2.description: After summoning an Electrode, deal volt damage equal to **100%** of ATK to all enemies within **30** meters of the Electrode and heal all allies (including the user) within its range by **200%** of ATK.

ge_common_movespeedup.name: Speed Up
ge_common_movespeedup.description: Increases basic speed by **100%** and increases mounted speed by **100%**.

ge_common_movespeedup_2.name: Gravity Rail Acceleration
ge_common_movespeedup_2.description: Each stack increases speed by **20%**. This effect can be stacked up to **5** times and lasts for **30** seconds.

ge_common_movespeedup_4_stack.name: Gravity Rail Sprint
ge_common_movespeedup_4_stack.description: Increases speed by **10%**. This effect can be stacked up to **10** times, losing **1** stack every second.

buff_matrix_ssr27_level1.description: When a target is being healed, their volt ATK is increased by **15%** for **20** seconds. This effect does not stack, and only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.

buff_matrix_ssr27_level2.description: When a target is being healed, their volt ATK is increased by **18%** for **20** seconds. This effect does not stack, and only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.

buff_matirx_ssr28_level1.name: Life Bridging

The next attack within **30** seconds will cast Lightning, dealing volt damage equal to **240%** of volt ATK on the first target hit, and damage caused by Electrodes is reduced by 50%. Cannot be triggered more than once in **10** seconds. "Lightning" charges do not stack. Only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.

The next attack within **30** seconds will cast Lightning, dealing volt damage equal to **300%** of volt ATK on the first target hit, and damage caused by Electrodes is reduced by 50%. Cannot be triggered more than once in **10** seconds. "Lightning" charges do not stack. Only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.

Cannot be triggered more than once in **10** seconds. "Lightning" charges do not stack. Only the highest level's effect is applied when obtained repeatedly.

In the state of Silent Flow: After the sword shadow releases Surge and blocks an attack, the teammate with the lowest HP percentage will get 3 block abilities, not including yourself, lasting for **10** seconds. The maximum blocking damage does not exceed **15%** of the teammate's Max HP.

Ignore **7%** of the target's flame resistance.
Different Calligraphy Characters gathered have different effects.
Gather 1 Discharge character "" for a **0%** discharge damage increase. Gather 2 Discharge characters "" for a **1%** shatter increase.

Gather 1 Attack character "" for a **5%** normal attack damage increase. Gather 2 Attack characters "" to gain a **6%** damage reduction during normal attacks.

**Volt Benediction**: Increase the entire team's volt ATK by **5%** when Benediction Resonance is active.
